name: Lost Kittens: Maze Garden
description:
Maze Garden is a cute and relaxing game, but one that can get you tense sometimes, where your main challenge will be not to get lost in a variety of 50 different mazes. And be careful not to fall into the water or get burned on the way, as you'll have to restart the level.
The mazes were designed one-by-one to provide progressive difficulty, but some are intended to be very difficult, are you up to the challenge?

Features

  • 50 hand-crafted levels with increasing complexity ;
  • 50 achievements to be collected;
  • Beautiful backgrounds in a cartoonish and cute pixel art style;
  • Original soundtrack created exclusively for the game;
